description: ff. 349. 304 x 199; 202 x 109 mm. 29 lin.Ṣafar 1135. Abridgment of Ibn al-Athīr's work, completed in Dhū al-Qaʻdah 916: Brockelmann, GAL, I, 439 (Ausz. 2); S I, 608. Incip.: ... الحمد لله الذى ىسر الوصول الى جامع الاصول

title: Taysīr al-wuṣūl ilá Jāmiʻ al-uṣūl.

subject: Hadith—Texts—Early works to 1800
